battleship2000.programlogic.domain.table

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleship2000.programlogic.domain.table.Square
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Square>

    public class Square
extends Object
implements Comparable<Square>
    A Square is a part of a Table. It contains information about its state and a reference to a maximum of one ship part.
    Author:
    Petri Kallio

      • setShipPart

        public void setShipPart(ShipPart part)
        Sets the ShipPart given as parameter as the Square's set ShipPart.

        The set ShipPart is a ShipPart that is tied to a square and set on the Table that the square is a part of.

        Parameters:
        part - the ShipPart to set as the Square's set ShipPart

        public int bomb()

        Returns:

      • floatAPart

        public void floatAPart(ShipPart part)
        Sets the ShipPart given as parameter as the Square's floating ShipPart.

        The floating part is a ShipPart that is tied to a square, but is not set on the Table that the square is a part of.

        Parameters:
        part - the ShipPart to set as the Square's floating part

      • removeFloatingPart

        public void removeFloatingPart()
        Sets the Square's floating part as null.
